DOC.criteria: Children 24 year age , weight length age within 10th 90th percentile plot NCHS growth chart Consuming cow 's milk least one month Serious concurrent illness acute infection Using systemic antibiotic steroid Recent probiotic use Feeding difficulty intolerance cow 's milk Conditions effect normal growth development Immunodeficiencies
